Articles.Content:
**Update:** This was a joke mod to protest Squad's decision to change the ROUND-8 tank to store Xenon (see [here](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/115621)). After a bit of community backlash, they announced they'd keep the ROUND-8 and make a new large Xenon tank. This mod is now officially dead - it served its purpose and will quietly walk into the sunset.

The CEO of Probodobodyne Inc is furious! He's blaming poor sales of his pet project, the Oscar-B fuel tank, on consumer preference of the ROUND-8 fuel tank. As a result, he's converting all new ROUND-8 tanks to store Xenon to boost Oscar-B sales. We need you to hide some ROUND-8 tanks where the CEO won't find them!

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/OiI8C)

**Description**

This is a Contract Pack to support the venerable ROUND-8 fuel tank while we still can. If we can store away enough ROUND-8 tanks, perhaps we can save them from a fate worse that decommissioning?

**Download**

**Ã¢â‚¬â€¹**

***CKAN***: In [CKAN](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/100067), Select and download the mod "Contract Pack: Save the ROUND-8"

***GitHub***: 

> 
> For the direct download option, please ensure you have all the dependencies before raising a support request:
> 
> 
> 
> 1. Contract Configurator is a required dependency and can be downloaded from the [Contract Configurator release thread](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/101604).
> 2. The Round8 contract pack can be downloaded from [GitHub](https://github.com/jrossignol/ContractPack-Round8/releases/latest).
> 
> 
> 
> 
> 

**Source**

The full source is available on [GitHub](https://github.com/jrossignol/ContractPack-Round8).

**Change Log**

> 
> **ContractPack-Round8 1.3.0**
> 
> 
> 
> - New contract: Add ROUND-8 tanks to the Kerbin Space Station (requires severedsolo's KSS contract pack).
> 
> 
> 
> 
> **ContractPack-Round8 1.2.1**
> 
> 
> 
> - Fix height requirement on monument.
> 
> 
> 
> 
> **ContractPack-Round8 1.2.0**
> 
> 
> 
> - Build a monument to the ROUND-8!
> 
> 
> 
> 
> **ContractPack-Round8 1.1.1**
> 
> 
> 
> - Ice caps are so disliked, we listed them twice!
> 
> 
> 
> 
> **ContractPack-Round8 1.1.0**
> 
> 
> 
> - Add contracts to dump Oscar-B tanks.
> 
> 
> 
> 
> **ContractPack-Round8 1.0.0**
> 
> 
> 
> - Initial release.
> 
> 
> 
> 
>

[TD]Like what you see? Consider donating to the beer fund! It will not go directly to supporting this or other mods under my care, but it may keep my motivation up!

[/TD]

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-18T04:58:42Z" title="04/18/2015 04:58  AM" data-short="9 yr">April 18, 2015</time> by nightingale**
  
1.3.0 changes
Brilliant!
Like we need more xenon tanks for the ion drives we don't use.....

> 
> Like we need more xenon tanks for the ion drives we don't use.....

Talk for yourself please ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

By Kraken's breath, those contracts are asking for A LOT of donuts to be secreted away. 

That's gotta crash a market or two. ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif) #SaveTheRound8
That's awesome. Rep for you.
Seriously, Squad should put your mod up on the blog for monday. :-)
Genius! This is what we need. Community Marketing at its finest.

> 
> By Kraken's breath, those contracts are asking for A LOT of donuts to be secreted away. 
> That's gotta crash a market or two. ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif) #SaveTheRound8

Actually, there's easy/medium/hard versions - I've changed the screenshot to show that. For the trivial ones you only have to save about 2-5 donuts. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
Brilliant! Squad listen to us please!
S a v e t h e r o u n d 8!!!!
Save the round 8. And nice mod! Rep!
Lets have a bit of balance shall we? [Destroy All Round-8's!](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/115752-0-90-Contract-Pack-Destroy-All-Round-8s!)

We will not stand for this. There shall be retaliation from the ROUND-8 camp, I assure you!

- - - Updated - - -

New version out. Now with an additional contract that takes team ROUND-8 on the offensive. Take some useless Oscar-B tanks and dump them in one of Kerbin's less savoury biomes! [Download it now](https://github.com/jrossignol/ContractPack-Round8/releases/tag/1.1.1)!

**ContractPack-Round8 1.1.0**

- Add contracts to dump Oscar-B tanks.

**ContractPack-Round8 1.1.1**

- Ice caps are so disliked, we listed them twice!

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-16T17:48:20Z" title="04/16/2015 05:48  PM" data-short="9 yr">April 16, 2015</time> by nightingale**

We've found your hidden cache on the Ice caps! [New Missions added](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/115752-0-90-Contract-Pack-Destroy-All-ROUND-8s!-%281-0-16-04-15%29)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-16T18:44:14Z" title="04/16/2015 06:44  PM" data-short="9 yr">April 16, 2015</time> by severedsolo**

New version, time to memorialize! [Download it now](https://github.com/jrossignol/ContractPack-Round8/releases/tag/1.2.1)!

**ContractPack-Round8 1.2.0**

- Contract to build a monument to the ROUND-8!

**ContractPack-Round8 1.2.1**

- Fix height requirement on monument.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-17T02:32:39Z" title="04/17/2015 02:32  AM" data-short="9 yr">April 17, 2015</time> by nightingale**
Instant rep
Your precious Round8's are currently being [ejected from the Kerbol System](https://github.com/severedsolo/ContractPack-DestroyRound8/releases/tag/1.2) as we speak!

New contract, more ROUND-8. [Hail ROUND-8](https://github.com/jrossignol/ContractPack-Round8/releases/tag/1.3.0).

**ContractPack-Round8 1.3.0**

- New contract: Add ROUND-8 tanks to the Kerbin Space Station (requires severedsolo's KSS contract pack).

All your tanks belong to us....

[http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/115752-0-90-Contract-Pack-Destroy-All-ROUND-8s!-%281-2-17-04-15%29?p=1843020#post1843020](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/115752-0-90-Contract-Pack-Destroy-All-ROUND-8s!-%281-2-17-04-15%29?p=1843020#post1843020)

Today it was announced that the board of Probodobodyne Inc met and removed the CEO. The interim CEO has announced that the ROUND-8 fuel tank will remain in its rightful place as Probodobodyne's flagship product. No statement has yet been made about the Oscar-B.

*I think given Squad's announcement about the ROUND-8 being saved that it's time to call it quits for this contract pack. It was a blast, thanks everyone for all the rep. And an even bigger thank goes out to severedsolo, there's no way this would've been nearly as much fun without him acting as the heel in this little show. So everybody who sent rep my way and is reading this, spread the love a little to severedsolo.* ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

I haven't read squadcast yet, but I'm happy to call a truce.

Thanks for being such a good sport, I've had a lot of fun, and thank you to everyone for playing along. Congratulations on your victory ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-18T04:34:06Z" title="04/18/2015 04:34  AM" data-short="9 yr">April 18, 2015</time> by severedsolo**
this was a fun read, thanks both of you ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
